gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 114, Wizards 90
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Wizards, 114-90. Donovan Mitchell led the Cavaliers with 26 points and four assists as Jarrett Allen added 12 points and 12 rebounds. Tyus Jones led the Wizards with 16 points and five assists. The Cavaliers improve to 20-15 as the Wizards move to 6-28.
